description: Japanese anemone (Anemone hupehensis var. japonica 'Bodnant Burgundy') is an absolutely stunning garden flower that adds a classic sophistication to any outdoor space. Its deep burgundy, silken petals surrounded by a halo of yellow stamens are truly striking. Blooms measure five inches in diameter and appear from late summer to early fall. Its foliage is as dark and luxurious as its petals, creating a perfectly balanced contrast. This reliable bloomer is easy to grow and will grace your garden space with vibrant color and captivating beauty for years to come.
